name: UDON 01: Wordmarks & typography
description:
Everybody who has an online brand needs a logo. However, if your brand is new, you shouldn't get a designer to do it â€” regardless of your budget. New businesses evolve and change quickly, so paying for a logo is like buying luxury clothing for a toddler: they'll grow out of them in a matter of weeks.


Instead, use the information in this file and make it yourself: in the process, you'll learn a lot about your brand and how you want your customers to perceive it.


Enjoy!


--
